com.wizzer.mle.parts.stages

Class MleApplicationFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • com.wizzer.mle.parts.stages.MleApplicationFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MleApplicationFrame
extends java.awt.Frame
    This class is a utility for creating a Frame in which a Magic Lantern application can render into.
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • MleApplicationFrame

        public MleApplicationFrame()
                    throws java.awt.HeadlessException
        The default constructor.

        The default size, 640x40, is used.

        Throws:
        java.awt.HeadlessException - This exception is thrown if the application frame can not be constructed.

      • MleApplicationFrame

        public MleApplicationFrame(java.lang.String name)
                    throws java.awt.HeadlessException
        A constructor that specifies the name of the application frame.

        The default size, 640x40, is used.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the application.
        Throws:
        java.awt.HeadlessException - This exception is thrown if the application frame can not be constructed.

      • MleApplicationFrame

        public MleApplicationFrame(java.lang.String name,
                           int w,
                           int h)
                    throws java.awt.HeadlessException
        A constructor that specifies the name of the application frame.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the application.
        w - The width of the applicaiton.
        h - The height of the application.
        Throws:
        java.awt.HeadlessException - This exception is thrown if the application frame can not be constructed.
